method.name: ComputeNewParameter
method.abstract: Maps a parameter on the initial curve to the corresponding parameter on the computed Nurbs representation.

method.name: ForbidPeriodicity
method.abstract: Avoids to create periodic Nurbs representation.

method.name: GetNurbsCurve
method.abstract: Returns the corresponding CATNurbsCurve, if the output dimension is 3.

method.name: GetPNurbs
method.abstract: Returns the corresponding CATPNurbs, if the output dimension is 2.

method.name: ImposeQuinticConversion
method.abstract: Sets the Nurbs degree to 5 for input circle or ellipse.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: RunWithSameParametrisation
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator by keeping the same parameterization for the input and resulting curve (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetOutputDimension
method.abstract: Defines the dimension of the output Nurbs (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: ComputeNewParameter
method.abstract: Maps a parameter on the initial surface to the corresponding parameter on the computed Nurbs representation.

method.name: ForbidPeriodicity
method.abstract: Avoids to create periodic Nurbs representation.

method.name: GetNurbsSurface
method.abstract: Returns the corresponding CATNurbsSurface.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: RunWithSameParametrisation
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator by keeping the same parameterization for the input and resulting surface (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATDynChamferRibbon
class.abstract: Class defining a chamfer ribbon.

method.name: GetEdge
method.abstract: Returns the edges to chamfer.

method.name: GetLeftValue
method.abstract: Returns the definition of the first value.

method.name: GetPropagationType
method.abstract: Returns the propagation mode.

method.name: GetRightValue
method.abstract: Returns the definition of the second value.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Returns the corresponding reference faces.

method.name: GetTypeChamfer
method.abstract: Returns the definition type of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

class.name: CATDynDraftAngle
class.abstract: Class defining an elementary draft operation.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Returns the draft angle value.

method.name: GetFaces
method.abstract: Returns the list of faces taken into account in <tt>this</tt> elementary draft operation.

class.name: CATDynDraftDomain
class.abstract: Class defining a draft domain.

method.name: GetDomainType
method.abstract: Returns the operation draft type.

method.name: GetNeutral
method.abstract: Returns the neutral element.

method.name: GetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Retrieves the pulling direction associated with <tt>this</tt> draft domain.

method.name: GetRibbons
method.abstract: Returns the ribbons associated with <tt>this</tt> draft domain.

class.name: CATDynDraftParam
class.abstract: Class defining the angle properties of an edge in a draft.

method.name: GetAngle
method.abstract: Returns the angle value associated with the edge of a draft ribbon.

method.name: GetLocation
method.abstract: Returns the cell on which the angle is defined.

method.name: GetRatio
method.abstract: Returns the ratio defining the location of the point on the edge.

class.name: CATDynDraftRibbon
class.abstract: Class defining a draft ribbon.

constructor.name: CATDynDraftRibbon
constructor.abstract: Constructs a square draft ribbon without angle values.

constructor.name: CATDynDraftRibbon
constructor.abstract: Constructs a square draft ribbon with a single angle value (other angles can be added afterwards).

method.name: AddDraftParam
method.abstract: Adds a specification of a draft angle value to define a variable draft.

method.name: GetAngles
method.abstract: Returns the definition of the elementary draft operations.

method.name: GetConstantAngle
method.abstract: Returns the common draft angle value, if any.

method.name: GetListOfFaces
method.abstract: Returns the faces of all the elementary draft operations.

method.name: GetListOfParams
method.abstract: Returns the parameters of the draft ribbon.

method.name: TestConstantAngle
method.abstract: Tests whether all the elementary draft operations have the same draft angle.

class.name: CATDynEdgeFilletRibbon
class.abstract: Class defining a fillet ribbon along an edge.

constructor.name: CATDynEdgeFilletRibbon
constructor.abstract: Constructs a ribbon along an edge.

method.name: GetPropagationType
method.abstract: Returns the propagation mode.

method.name: GetRadii
method.abstract: Returns the radius definitions of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Returns the input list of the edges defining <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: IsVariable
method.abstract: Returns whether <tt>this</tt> ribbon is of variable radius.

method.name: SetSpine
method.abstract: Defines the optional spine of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: SetVariable
method.abstract: Defines that <tt>this</tt> ribbon is of variable radius.

class.name: CATDynFaceFaceFilletRibbon
class.abstract: Class defining a fillet ribbon between two faces.

constructor.name: CATDynFaceFaceFilletRibbon
constructor.abstract: Constructs a ribbon between two faces.

constructor.name: CATDynFaceFaceFilletRibbon
constructor.abstract: Constructs a ribbon between two faces.

method.name: GetLeftBody
method.abstract: Returns the body of the opposite faces of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetLeftDomain
method.abstract: Returns the domain of the opposite faces of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetLeftOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the orientation of the shell domain of the opposite faces to take into account for <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetLeftSupport
method.abstract: Returns the opposite faces of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetRadii
method.abstract: Returns the radius definitions of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetRightBody
method.abstract: Returns the body of the first faces of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetRightDomain
method.abstract: Returns the domain of the first faces of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetRightOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the orientation of the shell domain of the first faces to take into account for <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetRightSupport
method.abstract: Returns the first faces of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: SetFaceFaceInitMode
method.abstract: Defines the multi-ribbon behaviour for the face/face ribbon.

class.name: CATDynFilletRadius
class.abstract: Class defining the radius properties of an edge in a ribbon.

method.name: GetDirection
method.abstract: Returns the angle defining the radius variation at the point on the edge.

method.name: GetLocation
method.abstract: Returns the cell on which the radius is defined.

method.name: GetRadius
method.abstract: Returns the radius value associated with the edge of a ribbon.

method.name: GetRatio
method.abstract: Returns the ratio defining the location of the point on the edge.

method.name: HasDirection
method.abstract: Tests whether an angle is defined to precise the radius variation at the point on the edge.

method.name: HasRatio
method.abstract: Tests whether a ratio is defined to precise the location of the point on the edge.

class.name: CATDynFilletRibbon
class.abstract: Base class defining a fillet ribbon.

method.name: GetConicParameter
method.abstract: Retrieves the tightness value of the fillet cross-section, if this one is conical.

method.name: GetEdgeReportingOption
method.abstract: Returns whether the internal ribbon edges are logged inside the journal.

method.name: GetFilletSectionType
method.abstract: Retrieves the shape of the fillet cross-section.

method.name: GetFilletTool
method.abstract: Reads the geometric tool of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetKeepEdgeMode
method.abstract: Returns whether keep edges (or rolling edges) are automatically searched in the fillet process.

method.name: GetMaxOption
method.abstract: Returns the type of the shape of the ribbon on the free boundaries.

method.name: GetNumberOfLaws
method.abstract: Returns the number of laws implemented for a fillet.

method.name: GetPropagAutoMode
method.abstract: Returns the propagation behavior in case of a multiple automatic propagation ribbons.

method.name: GetRadiusType
method.abstract: Retrieves the radius type.

method.name: GetRelimitationMode
method.abstract: Returns the type of relimitation on the input bodies.

method.name: GetSegmentationMode
method.abstract: Returns the construction mode of the resulting body.

method.name: GetSewingOption
method.abstract: Returns how the ribbon is seewed on the input skins.

method.name: GetSpecialEdges
method.abstract: Returns the kept (or rolling) edges.

method.name: GetSpine
method.abstract: Reads the optional spine of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Reads the type of this ribbon.

method.name: SetEdgeReportingOption
method.abstract: Defines whether the internal edges are logged inside the journal.

method.name: SetFilletRadiusType
method.abstract: Specifies the radius type.

method.name: SetFilletSectionType
method.abstract: Defines the shape of the fillet cross-section.

method.name: SetFilletTool
method.abstract: Defines the geometric tool of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: SetKeepEdgeMode
method.abstract: Defines whether keep edges (or rolling edges) are automatically searched in the fillet process.

method.name: SetMaxOption
method.abstract: Defines the type of the shape of the ribbon on the free boundaries.

method.name: SetPropagAutoMode
method.abstract: Defines the propagation behavior in case of a multiple automatic propagation ribbons.

method.name: SetRelimitationMode
method.abstract: Defines the type of relimitation on the input bodies.

method.name: SetSegmentationMode
method.abstract: Defines the construction mode of the resulting body.

method.name: SetSewingOption
method.abstract: Defines how the ribbon is seewed on the input skins.

class.name: CATDynRemoveFaceFilletRibbon
class.abstract: Class defining a tri-tangent fillet ribbon.

method.name: GetLeftBody
method.abstract: Returns the body of the opposite faces of <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetLeftDomain
method.abstract: Returns the domain of the opposite faces of <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetLeftOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the orientation of the shell domain of the opposite faces to take into account for <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetLeftSupport
method.abstract: Returns the opposite faces of <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetRadii
method.abstract: Returns the radius definitions of <tt>this</tt> ribbon.

method.name: GetRemoveBody
method.abstract: Returns the body of the third supporting faces (to remove) of <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetRemoveDomain
method.abstract: Returns the domain of the third supporting faces (to remove) of <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetRemoveOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the orientation of the shell domain of the third supporting faces to take into account for <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetRemoveSupport
method.abstract: Returns the third supporting faces (to remove) of <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetRightBody
method.abstract: Returns the body of the first faces of <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetRightDomain
method.abstract: Returns the domain of the first faces of <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetRightOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the orientation of the shell domain of the first faces to take into account for <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: GetRightSupport
method.abstract: Returns the first faces of <tt>this</tt> tri-tangent ribbon.

method.name: SetRemoveFaceInitMode
method.abstract: Defines the multi-ribbon behaviour for the tri-tangent ribbon.

class.name: CATICGMHybBoolean
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that performs Boolean operations on two bodies.

method.name: SetSelectedCells
method.abstract: Specifies the cells to be kept and the cells to be removed in the operation.

class.name: CATICGMHybBoundary
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that computes the boundary of a wire or a shell.

class.name: CATICGMHybDisconnect
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that inserts vertices in a wire or skin body, or inserts edges in a skin body.

method.name: GetCorrespondingPackNumber
method.abstract: Returns the rank of a created cell.

method.name: GetCorrespondingSide
method.abstract: Returns the location of the created cell.

method.name: GetQueryMode
method.abstract: Returns the state of the query mode.

method.name: SetQueryMode
method.abstract: Activates the query mode.

class.name: CATICGMHybIntersect
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that intersects two bodies.

method.name: SetFirstDomainToIntersect
method.abstract: Defines which domain of the first body must be intersected.

method.name: SetSecondDomainToIntersect
method.abstract: Defines which domain of the second body must be intersected.

class.name: CATICGMHybOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operators operating with surfacic and wireframe entities.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting CATBody of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMHybOperator.

method.name: GetTolerance
method.abstract: Returns the tolerance of the geometrically coincident elements to be taken into acccount by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance of the geometrically coincident elements to be taken into acccount by <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATICGMHybOperatorImp
class.abstract: Class defining the operators operating with surfacic and wireframe entities.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting CATBody of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMHybOperator.

method.name: GetTolerance
method.abstract: Returns the tolerance of the geometrically coincident elements to be taken into acccount by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance of the geometrically coincident elements to be taken into acccount by <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATICGMHybProject
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that projects a body on another one.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the maximum distance of projection for a given domain of the resulting body.

method.name: SetDomainSupport
method.abstract: Defines on which domain of the second body the projection is done.

method.name: SetDomainToProject
method.abstract: Defines which domain of the first body must be projected.

method.name: SetMaxDistanceValue
method.abstract: Specify a maximum distance for the solution(s) to be kept.

class.name: CATICGMHybSplit
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that splits two bodies.

method.name: GetKeepHalfSpaceMode
method.abstract: Queries whether ‘Keep elements in half space’ mode is activated or not.

method.name: GetSingleExtrapolMode
method.abstract: Queries whether ‘keep only the no intersecting solutions of extrapolated cuttings’ mode is activated or not.

method.name: SetKeepHalfSpaceMode
method.abstract: Sets or unsets the ‘Keep elements in half space’ mode.

method.name: SetSingleExtrapolMode
method.abstract: Sets or unsets the ‘keep only the no intersecting solutions of extrapolated cuttings’ mode.

class.name: CATICGMHybTrim
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that trims two bodies.

class.name: CATICGMInterproxCrv
class.abstract: Class representing the geometric operator that deforms curves on a set of points.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetCurvatureParameter
method.abstract: Defines the smoothness parameter (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetTensionParameter
method.abstract: Defines the tension parameter (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATICGMInterproxSur
class.abstract: Class representing the geometric operator that deforms surfaces on a set of points.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetContinuity
method.abstract: Defines the continuity constraints.

method.name: SetCurvatureParameter
method.abstract: Defines the smoothness parameter (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetTensionParameter
method.abstract: Defines the tension parameter (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATICGMLayDownOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that projects a body onto another one referred to as the support and returns a solution only if the distance is lower than the factory resolution.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the projected body or the initial body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

class.name: CATICGMLiss
class.abstract: Class defining a geometric operator that smoothes a set of points to create a curve.

method.name: GetMaxDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum deviation between a point and the smoothed curve.

method.name: GetPResult
method.abstract: Returns the created smoothed Pcurve.

method.name: GetParameters
method.abstract: Returns the parameters associated to each point .

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the created smoothed curve.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetDegree
method.abstract: Defines the degree of the resulting curve (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetImposedParametrization
method.abstract: Defines the parameters corresponding to each point of the initial set of points (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetMaxNumberOfArcs
method.abstract: Defines the maximum number of arcs of the created curve (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetSoftContinuity
method.abstract: Defines the continuity constraints on given points (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetTwinOption
method.abstract: Sets the arcs limits at the constrained points (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: UpdateForm
method.abstract: Defines a new set of points to be taken into account (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATICGMRecomposeShells
class.abstract: Class defining an operator that recomposes a multi-lump body from a list of shells to be removed or a list of shells to be kept.

method.name: GetConflictingShells
method.abstract: When the specification of the shells leads to a matter conflict, no result is generated and GetResult returns a NULL pointer.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the resulting body.

method.name: RemoveInternalShells
method.abstract: Removes all the internal shells.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

method.name: SetCellsToKeep
method.abstract: Specifies the list of cells to be kept.

method.name: SetCellsToRemove
method.abstract: Specifies the list of cells to be removed.

method.name: SetShellsToKeep
method.abstract: Specifies the list of faces to be kept.

method.name: SetShellsToKeep
method.abstract: Specifies the list of shells to be kept.

method.name: SetShellsToRemove
method.abstract: Specifies the list of faces to be removed.

method.name: SetShellsToRemove
method.abstract: Specifies the list of shells to be removed.

class.name: CATICGMSketchGeodesic
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that creates a geodesic curve from a point and a direction.

method.name: ChangeLength
method.abstract: Replaces the length specified in the <tt>CATCGMCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: ChangePoint
method.abstract: Replaces the point specified in the <tt>CATCGMCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: ChangePoint
method.abstract: Replaces the point and support specified in the <tt>CATCGMCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: ChangeSupport
method.abstract: Replaces the support specified in the <tt>CATCGMCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: ChangeTangent
method.abstract: Replaces the tangent specified in the <tt>CATCGMCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

class.name: CATICGMSkinExtrapol
class.abstract: Class representing an operator that extrapolates a shell body.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends an edge to extrapolate.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a list of edges to extrapolate.

method.name: GetJournal
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the topological journal dedicated to <tt>this</tt> CATICGMSkinExtrapol operator.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetDefaultExtrapolationValue
method.abstract: Selects all the edges of the shell boundary and sets to them a common extrapolation value.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Sets the ability to later modify the resulting body.

method.name: SetPropagationMode
method.abstract: Defines the propagation mode of the extrapolation value.

class.name: CATICGMSkinExtrapolation
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that extrapolates a surface in tangency.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the resulting body.

method.name: SetBorderMode
method.abstract: Specifies the type of extrapolation.

method.name: SetLength
method.abstract: Specifies the extrapolation length.

class.name: CATICGMSolidCuboid
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to create a topological cube.

class.name: CATICGMSolidCylinder
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to create a topological cylinder.

class.name: CATICGMSolidPrimitive

method.name: GetFactory
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the factory of the geometry used in <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetReport
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the journal.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting body created by <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATICGMSolidPyramid
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to create a topological pyramid.

class.name: CATICGMSolidSphere

method.name: SetDegreeU

method.name: SetDegreeV

class.name: CATICGMTopBlend

method.name: GetDefaultTransitionOrientation

method.name: GetDefaultWireOrientation

method.name: GetTransitionOrientation

method.name: GetWireOrientation

method.name: SetBorderMode

method.name: SetCleanGuidesOption

method.name: SetCouplingLines

method.name: SetSmoothAngleThreshold

method.name: SetSmoothOption

method.name: SetWireOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the orientation of the wire to be used by <tt>this</tt> operator(<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

class.name: CATICGMTopBodyExtremum
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that computes the point the furthest away from a given point in a given direction.

method.name: GetExtremum
method.abstract: Returns the distance between the origin and the extremum projection along the specified direction.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the created body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATICGMTopCAACompliantJournalChecker
class.abstract: Class defining an object that checks a topological journal.

method.name: CAAAddInputBody
method.abstract: Adds an input body to the CATICGMTopCAACompliantJournalChecker object.

method.name: CAACheck
method.abstract: Tests whether the check is valid.

class.name: CATICGMTopCleanCrvOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to clean a wire body.

method.name: GetCellReduction
method.abstract: Retrieve the current status of cell reduction defined on operator.

method.name: GetContinuityLevel
method.abstract: Retrieve the current continuity level to improve defined on operator.

method.name: GetDescendantEdge
method.abstract: Retrieves the result edge corresponding to an input edge.

method.name: GetDescendantVertex
method.abstract: Retrieves the result vertex corresponding to an input vertex.

method.name: GetMaxDeformationLocation
method.abstract: Returns the 3D location on the input wire and the 3D location on the output (corrected) wire corresponding to the maximum reached deformation.

method.name: GetMaxReachedDeformation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum deformation between input and output wires.

method.name: SetApplyMappingOfInitialVertices
method.abstract: Allows the activation of the mapping of the input vertices to the output vertices.

method.name: SetC1ToC2Management
method.abstract: Defines the way to treat non-C2 edges.

method.name: SetCellReduction
method.abstract: Reduce the number of cells after curvature correction.

method.name: SetConnexityGap
method.abstract: Defines the point continuity criterion for G0 correction.

method.name: SetConnexityMinGap
method.abstract: Defines the point continuity criterion below which the G0 correction is not applied.

method.name: SetContinuityLevel
method.abstract: Defines the highest continuity level to achieve on the wire.

method.name: SetCurvatureRatio
method.abstract: Defines the curvature criterion for G2 correction.

method.name: SetEndExtremityContinuityLevel
method.abstract: Defines the highest continuity level at the END extremity between the input wire and the result wire.

method.name: SetFixedCells
method.abstract: Defines the set of input edges and vertices that must stay unmodified through the operator.

method.name: SetForceOneEdgeImprovement
method.abstract: Combined with cell reduction mode, forces the operator to treat either the one-edge-wire case or any one edge case situated between two unsuppressed vertices.

method.name: SetMaxDeformation
method.abstract: Defines the maximum deformation allowed between the output and input bodies.

method.name: SetMinimumEdgeLength
method.abstract: Defines the minimum size of an edge to be corrected.

method.name: SetModeODT
method.abstract: This API should not be used.

method.name: SetPriorityMode
method.abstract: Defines the priority mode of cleaning operations.

method.name: SetShell
method.abstract: Defines the 2D cleaning mode.

method.name: SetShell
method.abstract: Defines the 2D cleaning mode with optional topological wire on shell " LyingOnLink " recovery.

method.name: SetSmartClosure
method.abstract: To use on Closed Wire with SetCellReduction or SetApplyMappingOfInitialVertices only.

method.name: SetStartExtremityContinuityLevel
method.abstract: Defines the highest continuity level at the START extremity between the input wire and the result wire.

method.name: SetTangencyAngle
method.abstract: Defines the tangency criteria for G1 correction.

method.name: SetTangencyMinAngle
method.abstract: Defines the tangency criterion below which the G1 correction is not applied.

class.name: CATICGMTopCorner

method.name: GetCorner

method.name: GetCurOrients
method.abstract: Retrieves the orientation of the parallels used to compute the center of the corner.

method.name: GetNumberOfCorners

class.name: CATICGMBodyChecker
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to check a given body.

method.name: BeginningDiagnosis
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting diagnosis.

method.name: Check
method.abstract: Checks a given body.

method.name: Create
method.abstract: Constructs an operator that checks a body.

method.name: Dump
method.abstract: Gets all the diagnoses of <tt>this</tt> operator results after run.

method.name: GetCheckMode
method.abstract: Gets the active check mode of the operator.

method.name: GetDiagnosis
method.abstract: Gets the current diagnosis of <tt>this</tt> operator results.

method.name: GetNbDiagnoses
method.abstract: Gets the number of diagnoses found after the operator run.

method.name: NextDiagnosis
method.abstract: Skips to the next diagnosis of <tt>this</tt> operator results, if any.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetCheckCells
method.abstract: Sets the check cells for the operator.

method.name: SetCheckMode
method.abstract: Sets the new active check mode of the operator.

method.name: SetCheckRules
method.abstract: Sets the check rules for the operator.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Type of <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATICGMCloseOperator
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that closes a skin body.

method.name: GetBooleanResult
method.abstract: Returns the body created from the Boolean operation between a given body and the thickened body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the resulting body of the closure operation.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

method.name: SetBooleanOperation
method.abstract: Asks for a boolean operation with the output of the operator (the so called closed skin) and <tt>iOperandBody</tt>.

class.name: CATICGMCrvDegreeModification
class.abstract: Class defining an operator that modifies the degree of a curve.

method.name: GetMaxDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum deviation between the initial and the new curve.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetDegree
method.abstract: Specifies the new degree.

class.name: CATICGMCrvFittingToNurbsCrv
class.abstract: Class defining a geometric operator that computes a (possibly approximated) NURBS representation of a CATCurve.

method.name: ComputeNewParameter
method.abstract: Maps a parameter on the initial curve to the corresponding parameter on the computed NURBS representation.

method.name: ForbidPeriodicity
method.abstract: Declares that the result NURBS must not be periodic.

method.name: GetMaxDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum deviation computed for the result curve.

method.name: GetNurbsCurve
method.abstract: Returns the result CATNurbsCurve.

method.name: GetPNurbs
method.abstract: Returns the result CATPNurbs.

method.name: ImposeKnotVector
method.abstract: Defines the knot vector to be used for the conversion.

method.name: ImposeSameParametrization
method.abstract: Declares that the result curve must have the same parameterization than the input curve to fit.

method.name: IsExactTransformation
method.abstract: Returns whether the transformation between the input and output curves is exact.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: Set3DCurveCreation
method.abstract: Imposes the conversion of a CATPCurve in a (3D) CATNurbsCurve.

method.name: SetInternalMinLength
method.abstract: Defines the minimal length of an internal arc of the result curve.

method.name: SetMaxArcs
method.abstract: Defines the maximum number of arcs of the result curve.

method.name: SetMaxDegree
method.abstract: Defines the maximum degree of the result NURBS representation.

method.name: SetRationalAllowed
method.abstract: Defines whether the result NURBS representation can be rational.

class.name: CATICGMDistanceMinBodyBody

method.abstract: Defines another computation (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Computes the distance (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetDistanceMax
method.abstract: Defines a maximum distance between the two bodies (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetPointComputationMode
method.abstract: Asks for the computation of the points realizing the minimum distance (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: GetResultPoint

method.abstract: Get the sign mode.

class.abstract: Interface representing the topological operator of thickness.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Defines the offset value for a given list of faces of a body to thick.

method.name: SetDefaultOffsetValue
method.abstract: Defines the offset value that applies to all the body to thicken.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

method.name: SetSharpBorderMode
method.abstract: Defines how borders are transformed in the neighborhood of sharp edges.

class.name: CATICGMDynTransformation
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator that transforms a CATBody.

method.name: SetAffinity
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATICGMDynTransformation as an affinity.

method.name: SetJournalInfo
method.abstract: Defines whether a CATCGMJournalInfo has to be added to the item corresponding to <tt>this</tt> operation.

method.name: SetNewJournal
method.abstract: Defines another journal to be filled after another run of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetReportMode
method.abstract: Defines the type of follow-up of the modifications to write in the journal.

method.name: SetRotation
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATICGMDynTransformation as a rotation.

method.name: SetScaling
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATICGMDynTransformation as a scaling.

method.name: SetSymmetry
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATICGMDynTransformation as a symmetry.

method.name: SetTransformation
method.abstract: Sets to <tt>this</tt> CATICGMDynTransformation the parameters of a given transformation.

method.name: SetTranslation
method.abstract: Defines <tt>this</tt> CATICGMDynTransformation as a translation.

class.name: CATICGMExtrapolParallelTool
class.abstract: Class defining the parallel computation.

method.name: GetData
method.abstract: Retrieves the topological data associated with <tt>this</tt> tool.

method.name: GetDistanceTool
method.abstract: Retrieves the type of computation.

method.name: GetExtrapInfo
method.abstract: Returns the relimitation type.

method.name: GetFactory
method.abstract: Retrieves the factory that creates the resulting body.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Retrieves the skin body on which the parallel is computed.

class.name: CATICGMExtrapolateBody
class.abstract: Class representing an operator that extrapolates 1D body (CATWire).

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetLimitToExtrapolate
method.abstract: Specifies the extrapolation length.

class.name: CATICGMFrFSmoothingOper
class.abstract: Class defining a geometric operator that smoothes a set of iNbrePts points to create a set of curves "SetOfCurves".

method.name: CuttingUntilReachTolerance
method.abstract: Defines automatically the maximum number of arcs of the created curve.

method.name: GetAverageDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the Average deviation between set of points and the SetOfCurves Result.

method.name: GetCurvatureVect
method.abstract: Returns the curvature constraint corresponding to each point of the initial set of points.

method.name: GetDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the deviation at each point of the initial set of points.

method.name: GetIndexMaxDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum deviation between set of points and the SetOfCurves Result.

method.name: GetParametrization
method.abstract: Returns The parametrization.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the SetOfCurves Result.

method.name: GetTangentVect
method.abstract: Returns the tangency constraint corresponding to each point of the initial set of points.

method.name: ImposedCuttingPoints
method.abstract: Defines List of Parametric Cutting points corresponding to list of points of the initial set of points.

method.name: ResetConstraint
method.abstract: Reset the constraint corresponding to each point of the initial set of points.

method.name: ResetTopConstraint
method.abstract: Resets the Topological constraint corresponding to each point of the initial set of points.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator .

method.name: SetConstraint
method.abstract: Defines the PassPoint constraint corresponding to each point of the initial set of points.

method.name: SetCuttingByCurvatureAnalysis
method.abstract: Compute automatically the number of Arcs by CurvatureAnalysis.

method.name: SetCuttingDefault
method.abstract: Defines CuttingDefault Option.

method.name: SetDegree
method.abstract: Defines the degree of the resulting curve.

method.name: SetMaxDegree
method.abstract: Defines the Maxdegree of the resulting curve.

method.name: SetMaxNumberOfArcs
method.abstract: Defines the maximum number of arcs of the created curve.

method.name: SetParamType
method.abstract: Defaults Options for parametrisation of set of points.

method.name: SetParametrization
method.abstract: Defines the parameters corresponding to each point of the initial set of points.

method.name: SetSlideIterations
method.abstract: Defines the number of iterations necessary to obtain the best resulting curve.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the Tolerance of the result.

method.name: SetTopConstraint
method.abstract: Defines the Topological PassPoint constraint corresponding to each internal point of the initial set of points.

class.name: CATICGMFrFTopologicalSweep
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator that computes swept surfaces.

method.name: ChooseOriginGuide
method.abstract: Internal use.

method.name: GetAllProfiles
method.abstract: Returns the computed curves at a given section of the sweep.

method.name: GetFrame
method.abstract: Retrieves the moving frame at a given ratio parameter.

method.name: GetNonCoupledSectionVertices
method.abstract: Gets vertices non coupled by automatic section vertices coupling.

method.name: GetProfilePosition
method.abstract: Retrieves the axes system of the profile (Sweep unspec.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetSpine
method.abstract: Returns the spine.

method.name: GetTwistedAreas
method.abstract: Retrieves the limiting parameters of the twisted areas ot the wrap areas.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetAnchorPoints
method.abstract: Defines the anchor points for profile positionning.

method.name: SetAngularLaw
method.abstract: Defines an angular law to rotate the moving frame around its <tt>Z</tt> axis.

method.name: SetAngularLaw
method.abstract: Defines an angular law to rotate the moving frame around its <tt>Z</tt> axis.

method.name: SetAngularLaws
method.abstract: Defines the angular laws for defining limiting guides.

method.name: SetAngularLaws
method.abstract: Defines the angular laws for defining limiting guides.

method.name: SetAngularLawsInDegree
method.abstract: Defines the angular laws for defining limiting guides.

method.name: SetAreasToEliminate
method.abstract: Defines the vertices limiting areas to eliminate from final sweep.

method.name: SetCanonicSurfacesDetection
method.abstract: Sets the canonic surfaces detection mode (cones/cylinders/planes).

method.name: SetCleanGuidesOption
method.abstract: Defines clean guides option, and clean parameter values.

method.name: SetCleanProfilesOption
method.abstract: Defines clean profiles option, and clean parameter values.

method.name: SetClosureMode
method.abstract: Asks for the body closure.

method.name: SetConeOption
method.abstract: Defines cone option for segment sweep computation with reference element (behaves like a draft computation).

method.name: SetCouplingGuides
method.abstract: Defines additional guides to be used only for profile sections coupling.

method.name: SetFunctionalGuides
method.abstract: Defines the references for the (start and end) angles measurement for a segment or circle sweep.

method.name: SetGuideContinuityCondition
method.abstract: Sets the continuity constraints (for multi profiles sweep) for a guide.

method.name: SetLengthLaws
method.abstract: Defines the length laws for a segment sweep.

method.name: SetLengthLaws
method.abstract: Defines the length laws for a segment sweep.

method.name: SetLimitGuideSlopeCondition
method.abstract: Defines a slope condition for a conic or a circle sweep.

method.name: SetLimitGuideSlopeCondition
method.abstract: Defines a slope condition for a conic or a circle sweep.

method.name: SetLimitGuides
method.abstract: Defines the limiting guides of a segment or circle sweep.

method.name: SetMiddleGuides
method.abstract: Defines the guide defining the center of the circle for a segment or circle sweep.

method.name: SetPlanesDetection
method.abstract: Sets the plane detection mode.

method.name: SetProfileAutomaticCouplingMode
method.abstract: Defines the profile automatic coupling mode.

method.name: SetProfileContinuityCondition
method.abstract: Sets the continuity constraints on start and end profiles (for multi profiles sweep).

method.name: SetProfileOrientation
method.abstract: Sets the profiles orientation (for multi profiles sweep).

method.name: SetProfilePosition
method.abstract: Defines the axes system of the profile.

method.name: SetProfilePositionType
method.abstract: Definition of profile positioning type for a sweep with one or two guides (Sweep unspec and birail).

method.name: SetProfileScalingOption
method.abstract: Defines the scaling mode to apply to the profile.

method.name: SetRadiusLaw
method.abstract: Defines the radius law of a circle sweep.

method.name: SetRadiusLaw
method.abstract: Defines the radius law of a circle sweep.

method.name: SetReferenceElement
method.abstract: Defines a variable viewing direction (sweep unspec).

method.name: SetRelimitationMode
method.abstract: Sets the relimitation mode by the extremity profiles.

method.name: SetSimplification
method.abstract: Sets the simplification mode.

method.name: SetSmoothAngleThreshold
method.abstract: Defines the smooth angle threshold.

method.name: SetSmoothOption
method.abstract: Defines a smooth option for moving frame and comb extraction.

method.name: SetSolutionChoice
method.abstract: Defines the conic, circle or segment to keep if case of ambiguous case.

method.name: SetSpine
method.abstract: Defines the spine.

method.name: SetTwistDetection
method.abstract: Defines the twist detection mode.

method.name: SetUntwistMode
method.abstract: Defines the untwist mode, in which every twisted area will be computed.

method.name: SetWrapDetection
method.abstract: Defines the wrap detection mode.

method.name: ValidateCaseNumber
method.abstract: Checks the input data according to the sweep case.

class.name: CATICGMGeoToTopOperator
class.abstract: Base abstract class of the operators that create topology from geometry.

method.name: GetReport
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the topological journal associated with <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetTolerance
method.abstract: Returns the tolerance for assembling the geometry.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance for assembling the geometry.

class.name: CATICGMGeometrySizeOptimization
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that optimizes the size of a factory by cleaning extrapolated geometries.

method.name: GetDiagnosis
method.abstract: Returns the diagnosis of the computation.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetForgetNURBSOriginalLimits
method.abstract: Cleans the NURBS objects without keeping the original limits (only the useful limits will be kept).

class.name: CATICGMHybAssemble
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that assembles two bodies.

method.name: GetSuppressBody
method.abstract: Retrieves the suppressed cells in a body.

method.name: GetSuppressMode
method.abstract: Returns the suppress mode.

method.name: SetCellsToMerge
method.abstract: Specifies a list of cells to be merged in a local join.

method.name: SetSuppressMode
method.abstract: Activates suppress mode : in the case of invalid cells, operator does a second pass after having removed them.

class.name: CATICGMRemoveEdge
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator that extrapolates some edges of a skin in order to create an extra surface and fill in internal domains.

method.name: GetAllTrickyEdges
method.abstract: Returns the list of CATEdge that couldn't be removed.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

method.name: SetPropagationMode
method.abstract: Mode de propagation en tangence : 1 = ON, 0 = OFF.

class.name: CATICGMRemoveFace
class.abstract: Class defining a topological operator which removes a set of faces from a volume or a skin.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a list of faces to be removed.

method.name: AppendLimiting
method.abstract: Restricts the removal of a face to a portion delimited by a single-face skin.

method.name: GetAllTrickyFaces
method.abstract: Returns the complete list of faces when the operation cannot complete.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the "Freeze" mode of the resulting body.

class.name: CATICGMRemoveFacesInShell
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that creates a shell body from a list of faces Moreover, the operator allows the faces to have inside loops (holes).

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATICGMShellOperatorPlus
class.abstract: Interface representing the topological operator of shell.

method.name: AppendOpening
method.abstract: Specifies the list of faces to be removed.

method.name: AppendSpecialOffset
method.abstract: Modifies the offset values for a list of faces of the body to shell.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: SetConstantThickness
method.abstract: Asks for a constant thickness for the resulting shell when one of the offset values is null.

method.name: SetDeviationAllowed
method.abstract: Sets the deviation allowed by the user.

method.name: SetDeviationMode
method.abstract: Sets the deviation mode.

method.name: SetLocalRegularization
method.abstract: Requires a local smoothing of a face when this face cannot be offsetted as a whole.

method.name: SetOffsetMixte
method.abstract: Sets the OffsetMixte options.

class.name: CATICGMSketchOperators
class.abstract: Parent class of CATICGMSketchGeodesic.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieve the geodesic curve.

method.name: GetWire
method.abstract: Retrieves the created wire.

class.name: CATICGMSurFittingToNurbsSur
class.abstract: Class defining a geometric operator that computes a (possibly approximated) NURBS representation of a CATSurface.

method.name: ComputeNewParameter
method.abstract: Maps a parameter on the initial surface to the corresponding parameter on the computed NURBS representation.

method.name: ForbidPeriodicity
method.abstract: Declares that the result NURBS must not be periodic.

method.name: ForceFitting
method.abstract: Forces the computation of an approximation even if the input surface already match the fitting criteria.

method.name: GetDiagnosis
method.abstract: Returns a diagnosis about the fitting process.

method.name: GetMaxDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum deviation computed for the result surface.

method.name: GetNurbsSurface
method.abstract: Returns the result CATNurbsSurface.

method.name: ImposeSameParametrization
method.abstract: Declares that the result surface must have the same parameterization than the input surface to fit.

method.name: IsExactTransformation
method.abstract: Returns whether the transformation between the input and output surfaces is exact.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetInternalMinLength
method.abstract: Defines the minimal length of an internal arc of the result surface.

method.name: SetMaxDegreeU
method.abstract: Defines the maximum degree of the result NURBS representation in the first direction of the surface.

method.name: SetMaxDegreeV
method.abstract: Defines the maximum degree of the result NURBS representation in the second direction of the surface.

method.name: SetMaxSegmentsU
method.abstract: Defines the maximum number of arcs of the result NURBS representation in the first direction of the surface.

method.name: SetMaxSegmentsV
method.abstract: Defines the maximum number of arcs of the result NURBS representation in the second direction of the surface.

method.name: SetRationalAllowed
method.abstract: Defines whether the result NURBS representation can be rational.

method.name: SetSideContinuity
method.abstract: Specifies a continuity constraint along the borders of the surface.

class.name: CATICGMThickPlus
class.abstract: Operator to blow or shrink the faces of a volume.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a face to offset.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: Appends a list of faces to offset by a common offset value.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetDefaultOffsetValue
method.abstract: Defines the default offset value for all the faces of the input body.

method.name: SetDeviationAllowed
method.abstract: Sets the deviation allowed by the user.

method.name: SetDeviationMode
method.abstract: Sets the deviation mode.

method.name: SetJournalTypeForFaceOffset
method.abstract: Modifies the type of the journal items created during <tt>this</tt> CATICGMThickPlus operation.

method.name: SetLocalRegularization
method.abstract: Activates/Deactivates local regularisation treatment (which may split faces) to smooth subparts of the non offsetable faces.

method.name: SetOffsetMixte
method.abstract: Sets the OffsetMixte options.

method.name: SetPropagationOff
method.abstract: Deactivates tangent propagation of offset values.

method.name: SetSharpBorderMode
method.abstract: Defines how borders are transformed in the neighborhood of sharp edges.

class.name: CATICGMThickSurfacePlus
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to thicken a body in two opposite directions according to the offsets specified for the thickening operation.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: SetConstantThickness
method.abstract: Asks for a constant thickness for the resulting shell when one of the offset values is null.

method.name: SetDeviationMode
method.abstract: Sets the deviation mode.

method.name: SetLocalRegularization
method.abstract: Requires a local smoothing of a face when this face cannot be offsetted as a whole.

method.name: SetOffsetMixte
method.abstract: Sets the "mixed offset" options.

method.name: SetRibbonSimplification
method.abstract: Simplifies geometry and topology of lateral ribbon.

class.name: CATICGMThickenOp
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that thickens a skin body into a volume body.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: This API must not be used.

method.name: GetBooleanResult
method.abstract: Returns the body created from the Boolean operation between a given body and the thickened body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the created thickened body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetBooleanOperation
method.abstract: Defines a Boolean operation between a given body and the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetCleverRibbonComputation
method.abstract: Robust ThickSurface.

method.name: SetSharpBorderMode
method.abstract: Defines how borders are transformed in the neighborhood of sharp edges.

class.name: CATICGMTopClashOperator
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that tests the clash between two bodies, and eventually computes their intersection.

method.name: GetDiagnostic
method.abstract: Returns the clash diagnosis.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the body resulting from the clash operation.

method.name: SetOnlyDiagnosticRequired
method.abstract: Specifies whether only the clash diagnosis is to be issued.

method.name: SetTestVolumeInclusion
method.abstract: For the case where only the diagnostic is required.

class.name: CATICGMTopExtrapolWireOpe
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator to extrapol a wire.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetContinuityType
method.abstract: Defines the type of continuity.

method.name: SetExtrapolLimit
method.abstract: Defines the extremity from which the extrapolation must start and the length of the extrapolation.

method.name: SetExtrapolLimit
method.abstract: Defines the extremity from which extrapolation must start and the body to reach.

method.name: SetNoSimplifOnLine
method.abstract: By default the result of the extrapolation of a line in tangency when no support is defined gives a body which only contains one edge.

class.name: CATICGMTopPositionPtFaceOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that tests the position of a 2D point with respect to a face.

method.name: GetOneResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of the test in case of a point.

method.name: GetResults
method.abstract: Returns the result of the test in case of an array of points.

method.name: SetSurParams
method.abstract: Defines another array of points to test.

method.name: SetToleranceOnBoundary
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance for a point to be on the face boundary.
